dialogue.line: [center]Stuck at the bottom of the ocean, huh?[/center]
[center]Don't worry. Help is on the way.[/center]
[center]The rescue team will arrive in approximately four days.[/center]
[center]I would recommend you active your sonar.[/center]
[center]The wildlife is particularly aggresive down there.[/center]
[center]Things are going wellâ€”the recovery ship will be there soon.[/center]
[center]If command weren't so lax we could be there now...[/center]
[center]The admins would be [wave]scrambling[/wave] if it were [wave]one of them.[/wave][/center]
[center]I hope you have plenty of rations down there.[/center]
[center]If all goes as planned, we'll be there tomorrow.[/center]
[center]The engineers made the pod calculations for the [wave]imperial system.[/wave][/center]
[center]The pod [wave]voilently[/wave] imploded at a depth of around 3,000 meters.[/center]
[center]I got the process expedited so we'll be there tomorrow.[/center]
[center]The expedited barge is stirring up the water and is causing [wave]increased activity.[/wave][/center]
